description: Describes the given dataset group. For more information on dataset groups, see CreateDatasetGroup.

parameters.name: datasetGroupArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group to describe.

nested_items.name: datasetGroup
nested_items.description: A listing of the dataset group's properties.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: datasetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the dataset group.
CREATE PENDING > CREATE IN_PROGRESS > ACTIVE -or- CREATE FAILED.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that has permissions to access the Key Management Service (KMS) key. Supplying an IAM role is only valid when also specifying a KMS key.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Key Management Service (KMS) key used to encrypt the datasets.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time (in Unix time) of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The last update date and time (in Unix time) of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If creating a dataset group fails, provides the reason why.

nested_items.name: domain
nested_items.description: The domain of a Domain dataset group.
